comment._content: This shot (but not this copy, one cropped differently) is used in www.nndb.com/people/061/000089791/ Pancho Villa AKA José Doroteo Arango Arámbula en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pancho_Villa "José Doroteo Arango Arámbula (5 June 1878 – 20 July 1923) – better known by his pseudonym Francisco Villa or his nickname Pancho Villa – was one of the most prominent Mexican Revolutionary generals."
